H0.text: Round the Clock, Hare and Hounds, Cricket and Shanghai are all games played on which type of board. Billiards

H1.text: Round the Clock, Hare and Hounds, Cricket and Shanghai are all games played on which type of board. Backgammon

H2.text: Round the Clock, Hare and Hounds, Cricket and Shanghai are all games played on which type of board. Chess

H3.text: Round the Clock, Hare and Hounds, Cricket and Shanghai are all games played on which type of board. Darts

A4.text: Round the Clock (also called Around the World, 20 to 1, and Jumpers) is a game involving any number of players where the objective is to hit each section sequentially from 1 to 20 starting after a starting double.

A5.text: Cricket is a widely played darts game involving a race to control and score on numbers between 20 and 15 and the bullseye, by hitting each of these targets for three marks to open or own it for scoring.
